name: 17th International Conference on Humanities, Psychology and Social Sciences
content: The International Conference on Psychology, Social Sciences & Humanities is coming back for its 17th edition. 11 years of cross-border learning. 11 years of helping talented researchers take their academic careers to new heights. 11 years of brilliant networking, discussions, and collaborations. Get ready to learn about the newest developments in the world of social sciences and psychology, learn from our talented speakers, ask important questions, take notes, join roundtable sessions, and so much more! Interact and converse with leading experts and professionals from all these fields and subfields. This social sciences conference is a great space for forming networks and partnerships, presenting your research, getting featured in indexed academic journals, and taking your career to the next level. Finally, donâ€™t miss out on a range of interesting topics like academic integrity, counterproductive work behavior, and reconstructing social roles.
